body.name: DearKlairs Rich Moist Soothing Cream 80ml, Sensitive Skin, Hypoallergenic, Centella Asiatica, Ceremide, Moisturizer, Full Hydration, Non-sticky texture, K-beauty

features: ✅SOOTHING & COMFORTABLE MOISTURE BARRIER - Infused with yeast-derived Beta Glucan, this cream fortifies the skin's natural moisture barrier. It contains hypoallergenic ingredients that are soothing and comfortable even from sensitive and combination skin.

✅PERFECT OIL AND WATER BALANCE - The Rich Moist Soothing Cream enhances the skin's ability to repair cells by strengthening the protective layer of dry and sensitive skin from the inside out. It makes skin the most comfortable condition by balancing proper oil and water balance.
✅SPREADABLE & NON-STICKY TEXTURE - With its spreadable and non-sticky texture, it absorbs effectively on the skin for any skin type.

✅RESULTS TESTED FOR SENSITIVE SKIN - Primary skin irritation test for sensitive skin, Skin sebum, moisture balance improvement test, Skin barrier function improvement test, 24-hour continuous hydrating test

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rich Moist Soothing Cream is an all-year moisturizing cream made for battling sensitive skin through all seasons. Restore the balance in your skin with the gentle & sufficient KLAIRS Rich Moist Soothing Cream.
Benefits Renewal Points Size Variations Cruelty free & Vegan friendly

Ingredients Water, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Stearic Acid, Butylene Glycol, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Microcrystalline Wax, Betaine, Sorbitan Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Dimethicone, Arginine, Carbomer, Chlorphenesin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Paeonia Suffruticosa Root Extract, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Nelumbium Speciosum Flower Extract, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Citric Acid, Beta-Glucan, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Centella Asiatica Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Althaea Rosea Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ceramide NP, Disodium EDTA, Polyquaternium-51, Apium Graveolens (Celery) Extract, Brassica Rapa (Turnip) Leaf Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Brassica Oleracea Capitata (Cabbage) Leaf Extract, Disodium Adenosine Triphosphate, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Brassica Oleracea Italica (Broccoli) Extract, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit/Leaf/Stem Extract, Lysine HCl, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Acetyl Methionine, Theanine, Proline, Palmitic Acid, Arachidic Acid, Oleic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Algin, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Natto Gum, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So hydrating and balanced!
reviews.reviewText: I live in a very dry climate. The previous moisturizer that I used was a pretty basic Good Molecules moisturizer. I needed something moisturizing, didn't break me out, and didn't smell too strong. This moisturizer is amazing! I have been using it for about a month now and even though it's been super dry here, I have not been flaking. I was flaking pretty badly around my nose area and the corner of my mouth but ever since I've been using this, I haven't experienced any flaking at all! It feels creamy but not too thick or oily. It absorbs into my skin really well. Feels hydrating but not oily. I have been loving this! There really isn't a scent. I wanted something that fit within a budget with quality ingredients. This is it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective & great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I love that I found a vegan moisturizer from South Korea. I've tried Korean and non-Korean moisturizers and all of them had their issues. This is the best moisturizer I've ever tried. First of all, this kind of container is better for preserving the ingredients. Second, it's good for sensitive skin, using no fragrance, but it still has a slight smell that's pleasant. Third, it is very moisturizing, for someone with dry skin like myself, but it's not overly thick, and blends in fast, you don't have to spend five minutes making sure that everything is blended into your skin. It's great for all seasons as well, not leaving your face with a heavy, greasy feel or drying out quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HIGHLY, HIGHLY, HIGHLY RECOMMEND FOR DRY/SENSITIVE SKIN
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is amazing, and now I'm interested in trying out other products by KLARIS! For a quick background, I'm 20 years old and have been suffering from sensitive/dry/acne prone skin since I was a freshman in high school. I have A really pale complexion and my face gets red and irritated very easily if I use a product that is too harsh. BUT THIS KLARIS MOISTURIZER IS THE BEST THING THAT I'VE EVER TRIED!I used to use a sunscreen/moisturizer that my dermatologist prescribed me. It was working for a while during the fall, but then winter came along and I started to notice that the product she prescribed to me wasn't getting rid or smoothing the dry/flaky patches around my nose and mouth. But I still kept using it because I thought 'the doctor knows best.' When I went to see her again in early spring, I told her about the problem, and she just prescribed the same product but with less sunscreen and more moisturizer...So I followed her directions, but then noticed that the stuff was starting to burn my skin...IT SERIOUSLY FELT LIKE HELL HAD DROPPED A FIRE BOMB ON MY FACE! And it not only didn't get rid of the dry patches but also made my face very irritable and itchy. So I took matters into my own hands and did some research.I've always been a fan of Korean beauty products, and so I looked into specific brands and products that were orientated around dry/sensitive skin. KLARIS is a brand that is known for creating great products for people with sensitive and dry skin, so I decided to give this KLARIS Rich Moist Soothing Cream a go. AND I REPEAT, THIS STUFF IS AMAZING. It hydrates and smooths my skin, getting rid of any dry areas and does not irritate at all! It also feels very light on the skin, which is a plus for me at least, as I don't like putting a lot of stuff on my face, including skin products and makeup.Overall, I would definitely recommend this to anyone who has problems with dry/sensitive skin. It doesn't make me break out either! Highly, highly, highly recommend and I can't wait to try out more products from KLARIS!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soothing After Retinol Irritation
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for calming, sensitive moisturizer that was thicker than my usual face lotion. NJ winter weather means heat blasting even if it’s not super cold, so with the dry environment + upping my retinol at night, my face is feeling it. I was pleasantly surprised with how thick and moisturizing this was without feeling greasy/heavy. I was using two mid priced “calming” face lotions + a moisturizing SPF and my face still felt tight. After applying this cream on damp skin my face felt much more comfortable and not tight at all. If you’re using any retinols, tretinoin or post chem peel and need some relief, give this one a try. Seems to layer well under SPF without pilling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using Klair’s soothing crème for over 4 years now. And I would still use it wherever I am. It helps my dry skin in any weather. It doesn’t irritate my skin and doesn't have any strong fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Survived my skincare overhaul
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is some of the ONLY moisturizer that my skin doesn't react to. I struggled to find anything that didn't make my skin red. I had to switch cleanser, toner, everything, except this one! I love this lotion!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My fav moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: This is a great, basic moisturizer made for normal to dry skin. I live in Utah and it soothes my dry skin and is great under makeup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my combo skin!
reviews.reviewText: I have been on the search for a good moisturizer for a while now that was hydrating enough for the dry parts of my face but not too much for the oily parts. This moisturizer has helped hydrate my dry parts especially around my nose. It’s awesome and it did not irritate my skin at all. It’s great for make up prep as well and really allows my skin to stay hydrated throughout the day. It really helped during the winter time as well! This is a very good product for oily skin people too as my mom uses it as well and she loves it! It also does not have a scent.
I tried many products of this brand . Great quality and price

I used to swear by the Dermalogica skin smoothing cream because I have the most dehydrated, sensitive skin and it feels like your skin takes a drink of water when you use it, but the price range us a little high for the amount that I was using. I've been on the hunt for something similar and I think i may have found it with the Klairs Rich Moist Soothing Cream.A small amount glides across your face like butter and soaks in immediately without feeling greasy, but still leaving this sort of moisture barrier on the surface of your skin. I prefer to look dewy and glowy as i have very dry skin and this moisturizer leaves your skin looking plump and healthy. It does not break me out and i use it both morning and night but apply a little bit more at night to get a more nourishing finish. The price range is great and I love the squeeze tube packaging for sanitary reasons. The scent is subtle, almost like lemongrass or something, and does not cause irritation to my extremely sensitive skin whatsoever. The list of ingredients is actually readable and packed with amazing stuff. HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS MOISTURIZER.

reviews.reviewTitle: Básica pero efectiva. Crema hidratante de KLAIRS
reviews.reviewText: Es una crema hidratante, principalmente para el rostro y cuello de la marca KLAIRS.El formato es muy grande, contiene 80 ml aproximadamente. Pero lo mejor es que cunde muchísimo.Se absorbe muy bien, no deja residuo pegajoso y aunque tiene perfume es muy sutil y agradable.Es una crema de uso diario para pieles algo sensibles o delicadas.

reviews.reviewTitle: Leider nicht für meine empfindliche Haut
reviews.reviewText: Habe mir die Creme gekauft weil sie für empfindliche Haut sein soll. Dies ist bei mir leider gar nicht der Fall und mein Gesicht reagiert mit Jucken und Pickeln. Schade, war ja nicht grade günstig.
Best product for dry and sensitive skin.Keeps skin hydrated for more than 5 hrs
